name: Panzer Front bis.
overview: Panzer Front bis is an updated version of the original Panzer Front, released for the Sony PlayStation in Japan on February 8, 2001. Bis (Latin for 'once more') features all of the original game's tanks and missions, with additional tanks, ten scenarios (including one set during Operation Olympic), and a mission editor. It was due to be released in Europe in the middle of 2002, but JVC, the UK publisher, shut down its video game branch before Bis could be converted and released.
